decision_conditions: Car Parking Details to be Implemented
description: Change of use of part second floor, part third floor, fourth floor, part fifth floor, part sixth floor, part seventh floor and part eighth floor from Class B1(a) office to Class C3 dwellinghouses to form 57 one bedroom units (56 day application for prior approval in respect of transport and highways, contamination, flooding, noise impacts, natural light to habitable rooms under Class O Part 3 of the GPDO)
